official_title: Strategy to Reduce Bladder Activity With RhPSMA 7.3: Comparison of 18F-RhPSMA 7.3 PET/CT With and Without Furosemide in Biochemical Recurrence of Prostate Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Adenocarcinoma of the prostate, post-prostatectomy
* Biochemical recurrence of prostate cancer following radical prostatectomy (RP) with or without adjuvant or salvage therapy: PSA >= 0.2 ng/mL followed by a subsequent confirmatory PSA value >= 0.2 ng/mL
* Age over 18
* Ability to provide written informed consent
* Patients with standard of care creatinine =< 1.3 mg/dL performed within 90 days prior to enrollment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Inability to undergo 18F-rhPSMA PET-CT, contraindications to furosemide or urinary incontinence
